app_name: Groups Control Groups Photo and Video Editing Apps WILD SHOT Photo Filter Grain
app_description: Edit your photos with 15 retro effects and professional color looks. More than 200 filters are available for editing in this app. Apply Film Burn Film Grain ... Add a subtitle to your image as you know it from old movies. This subtitle can be placed at the bottom of the image. All Free Features: Professional filters Film grain Filmburn Light leaks Retro dust scratches effects Date stamp Chromatic aberration Vintage subtitle text Vintage frames Brightness Contrast Shadows or Tint settings Motion blur effect Draw glitter or sparkle texture Most functionality is free to use. If you upgrade to a premium account you unlock: Use more than 200 presets in 20 filter packs The filters are constantly updated and improved These features are available through an In App purchase: Start filtering today and use all pro features for one week completely free of charge. After the one week free trial this subscription automatically renews for 7.99 or equivalent per 1 year subscription unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the trial period. You can subscribe and pay through your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Your subscription automatically renews unless cancelled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period and identify the cost of the renewal. Subscriptions may be managed by you and auto renewal may be turned off by going to your Account Settings after purchase. Buying in App Purchases requires an active Internet connection. Further information: Technical support: developer sebastianroth.org Buying in App Purchases requires an active Internet connection.
